description: MLB API MCP Server - A comprehensive bridge between AI applications and MLB data sources, enabling seamless integration of baseball statistics, game information, player data, and more. Provides access to current standings, schedules, player stats (traditional and sabermetric like WAR, wOBA, wRC+), team information, live game data, highlights, and advanced Statcast analytics. Built with FastMCP and Python 3.10+.

tools.name: get_mlb_standings
tools.description: Get current MLB standings for a given season with flexible filtering by league (AL, NL, or both), season, and date.

tools.name: get_mlb_schedule
tools.description: Get MLB game schedules for specific date ranges, sport ID, or teams with comprehensive filtering options.

tools.name: get_mlb_team_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific MLB team by ID or name, including metadata and roster information.

tools.name: get_mlb_player_info
tools.description: Get detailed biographical information about a specific player by their MLBAM ID.

tools.name: get_mlb_boxscore
tools.description: Get complete game boxscores for a specific game by game ID, with optional timecode and field filtering.

tools.name: get_mlb_linescore
tools.description: Get inning-by-inning game scores and linescore information for a specific game.

tools.name: get_mlb_game_highlights
tools.description: Get video highlights and key moments for a specific game by game ID.

tools.name: get_mlb_game_scoring_plays
tools.description: Get play-by-play data for a specific game with optional filtering by event type (e.g., 'scoring_play', 'home_run').

tools.name: get_mlb_game_pace
tools.description: Get game duration and pace statistics for a given season and sport.

tools.name: get_mlb_game_lineup
tools.description: Get detailed lineup information for a specific game, including batting order, positions, and substitutions.

tools.name: get_multiple_mlb_player_stats
tools.description: Get traditional player statistics for multiple players with filtering by group (hitting/pitching), type, and season.

tools.name: get_mlb_sabermetrics
tools.description: Get advanced sabermetric statistics (WAR, wOBA, wRC+, etc.) for multiple players for a specific season.

tools.name: get_mlb_roster
tools.description: Get team rosters with various roster types (40Man, fullSeason, etc.) and optional date filtering.

tools.name: get_mlb_search_players
tools.description: Search for MLB players by name with configurable search parameters and sport filtering.

tools.name: get_mlb_search_teams
tools.description: Search for MLB teams by name with flexible search key options (name, ID, or all).

tools.name: get_mlb_players
tools.description: Get all players for a specific sport and season with comprehensive player listings.

tools.name: get_mlb_teams
tools.description: Get all teams for a specific sport and season with detailed team information.

tools.name: get_mlb_draft
tools.description: Get comprehensive draft information and player selections for a specific year.

tools.name: get_mlb_awards
tools.description: Get award recipients and detailed information for specific MLB awards by award ID.

tools.name: get_statcast_batter
tools.description: Retrieve advanced MLB Statcast data for a single batter over a specified date range with detailed analytics.

tools.name: get_statcast_pitcher
tools.description: Retrieve advanced MLB Statcast data for a single pitcher over a specified date range with detailed analytics.

tools.name: get_statcast_team
tools.description: Retrieve comprehensive MLB Statcast data for all players on a team over a date range with customizable field selection.

tools.name: get_current_date
tools.description: Get the current date in YYYY-MM-DD format for use with other MLB API functions.

tools.name: get_current_time
tools.description: Get the current time in HH:MM:SS format for timestamping and scheduling purposes.
